synopsis.text: Gochuumon wa Usagi Desu ka??: Sing for You revolves around the timid Chino Kafuu, who finds herself in a challenging situation after impulsively agreeing to perform a solo in her school's choir for an upcoming music festival. Suffering from stage fright, Chino turns to her friends and the comforting atmosphere of the Rabbit House café for support. To help her conquer her fears, the café transforms into a lively karaoke bar, with everyone enthusiastically participating to boost Chino's confidence. As the day of the performance approaches, Chino's friends and the enigmatic Rize Tedeza work together to help her find her voice and overcome her anxieties. This heartwarming tale showcases the power of friendship and the strength one can find within themselves when faced with adversity.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
